name: harshit-devhub
body:
### Know me
Hi Guys, I am Harshit Aggarwal, a graduate in [Computer Science & Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Indore] (http://cse.iiti.ac.in/), currently working at [Arcesium] (http://arcesium.com) developing software for post-trade activities of alternative asset managers (like hedge funds).

####Work
I work on Java platform and develop web based software.

####Finance
Whatever be ones job area (from IT to Agro), Finance is something that is intrinsic to everyone's life. I closely follow global and domestic macros to make money from money, or to the very least, beat inflation :) .

####Leisure  
I love to play and follow Table Tennis. A big [Jan-Ove Waldner](http://www.jo-waldner.com/) fan !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
